00195 
00196 class RecipeException : public std::exception
00197 {
00198 public:
00199 
00200    virtual const char* what() const throw()
00201    {
00202       return std::string("BeerXML RECIPE error: " + _err + "\n").c_str();
00203    }
00204 
00205    RecipeException( std::string message )
00206    {
00207       _err = message;
00208    }
00209 
00210    ~RecipeException() throw() {}
00211 
00212 private:
00213 
00214    std::string _err;
00215 };
00216 
00217 struct Recipe_ptr_cmp
00218 {
00219    bool operator()( Recipe* lhs, Recipe* rhs)
00220    {
00221       return *lhs < *rhs;
00222    }
00223 };
